title: Scientists engineer mouse 'smart house' to study behavior

title_detail.value: Scientists engineer mouse 'smart house' to study behavior

summary: Researchers have developed a 'smart house' for mice, that allows them to study the animals' behavior with minimal disturbance for periods of up to 18 months.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have developed a 'smart house' for mice, that allows them to study the animals' behavior with minimal disturbance for periods of up to 18 months.
